mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Lightburn, Joseph
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Nov 13 1861. By Telegraph from Point Pleasant, 12 1861. Send me two 2 pieces of artillery with ammunition. Guyandotte has been taken Ceredo threatened with three thousand 3000 rebels Gallipolis and Pt Pleasant in danger Col Lightburn 23 Hm102 paid
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Lightburn, Joseph
Point Pleasant, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis Harrison
